name: reserve-a-seat-for-the-talks-and-attend-a-workshop--madelyn-barlow;issue-jira-6-browser-chrome-context-chrome-feature-02-register-registrationto-the-conference-capability-features-02-register-theme-features
title: Reserve a seat for the talks and attend a workshop (Madelyn Barlow)

testSteps.description: Given that Madelyn Barlow gets access to the ticket reservation page

children.description: Madelyn Barlow visits the conference page
Madelyn Barlow opens the browser at "/"
Madelyn Barlow maximises the browser window
Madelyn Barlow wants to register
Madelyn Barlow clicks on the Register button

testSteps.description: When he buys a quantity of 3 regular tickets for the talks

children.description: Madelyn Barlow buys a quantity of 3 regular tickets for the talks
Madelyn Barlow buys a quantity of 3 tickets of type regular
Madelyn Barlow clicks on the Talks tab
Madelyn Barlow enters 3 into the Number of Regular Tickets field

testSteps.description: And he buys a quantity of 4 tickets for the workshop Workshop C

children.description: Madelyn Barlow buys a quantity of 4 for the workshop Workshop C
Madelyn Barlow buys a quantity of 4 tickets of type Workshop C
Madelyn Barlow clicks on the Workshops tab
Madelyn Barlow enters 4 into the Number of Workshop C Tickets field

testSteps.description: And he fills the registration form with his personal info: Madelyn Barlow, bennettHorne, bennetthorne@isonus.com, 12/10/1972, AMTAS, 383 Arlington Avenue - Jardine - Alaska - 1904, Coventry, 68482, Greece

children.description: Madelyn Barlow fills the registration form with his Madelyn Barlow, bennettHorne, bennetthorne@isonus.com, 12/10/1972, AMTAS, 383 Arlington Avenue - Jardine - Alaska - 1904, Coventry, 68482, Greece
Madelyn Barlow scrolls to the Continue button of the tickets section
Madelyn Barlow clicks on the Continue button of the tickets section
Madelyn Barlow enters Madelyn Barlow into the Actor's Fullname
Madelyn Barlow enters bennettHorne into the Actor's Nickname
Madelyn Barlow enters bennetthorne@isonus.com into the Actor's Email
Madelyn Barlow picks the date 12/10/1972 on the Actor's Date of Birth
Madelyn Barlow enters AMTAS into the Actor's Company
Madelyn Barlow enters 383 Arlington Avenue - Jardine - Alaska - 1904 into the Actor's Address
Madelyn Barlow enters Coventry into the Actor's City
Madelyn Barlow enters 68482 into the Actor's Zip
Madelyn Barlow selects "Greece" from the Actor's Country
Madelyn Barlow clicks on the Continue button of the registration form

testSteps.description: Then he sees the message 'Thank you to have been registered to the AT conference'

children.description: Madelyn Barlow checks the text of the Thanking message for the registration
